content: one-row lace prayer shawl every time a knitter picks up needles this prayer is read or spoken the knitter s prayer may this shawl be for you a sign of god s loving healing presence may it warm when you are weary may it surround you with encouragement when you are discouraged may it assure you of god s care and comfort when you and your loved ones are troubled may it remind you that you are always safe in the arms of jesus and that you are surrounded by the prayers of others materials 2 skeins james c brett marble chunky yarn shown in mc10 size 13 needles straight or circular directions multiple of 5+3 stitches co 73 stitches creates fabric approximately 28 x 62 excluding fringe pattern row 1 and all row *k3 yo p2tog* k3 bobble and make 12 fringe bundles for each end representing christ s 12 disciples note i make 24 fringe bundles before beginning the shawl and then just knit to the end of both skeins i wrap the yarn five times around a dvd case for each fringe bundle louis chicquette chicquette@aol com
